description: Carry 3 bikes on the back of your car, without them wobbling and bumping about.Soft rubber cradles and straps secure your bikes without damaging the top tubes or marring the paint.Anti-sway cradles prevent bikes from touching each other or touching the vehicle.Hub mounting system is quick to install.Folds flat for convenient storage when not in use.Soft cushion pads protect trunk and hatch.6 adjustable straps hold carrier snugly to the vehicle.Fits on most 3, 4 and 5-door vehicles.
name: SportRack Pursuit 3 Bike Trunk Mount Rack
